purpose: The email announces a postdoctoral position in Computer Science at Karlstad University, focusing on the OPEHRA project, which integrates human rights into AI-supported digital health systems. It invites potential candidates to apply and encourages recipients to share the opportunity with suitable individuals. The position emphasizes interdisciplinary research and collaboration with industry partners.
evidence_sentences: We are looking for a highly motivated postdoc researcher to work together with us in the KKS-funded project 'OPEHRA: Operationalisng Human Rights in the Design of AI-supported Digital Health'.
The postdoctoral fellow will conduct research together with business partners in the field of AI-based systems for digital health.
Please disseminate it to potential candidates that you may know, and feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions.
The position is available within the Privacy & Security (PriSec) research group at the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science.
